definition: (neologism c. 2006) if you live long enough, you'll see everything/Just incredible!
to live/alive/living/work/workmanship
(long) time/(long) duration of time
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
(coll.) nobody can beat that/extraordinary/remarkable

(of news etc) so thrilling that everyone is rejoicing and spreading the word (Internet slang)/acronym from 喜聞樂見|喜闻乐见[xi3 wen2 le4 jian4], 大快人心[da4 kuai4 ren2 xin1], 普天同慶|普天同庆[pu3 tian1 tong2 qing4] and 奔走相告[ben1 zou3 xiang1 gao4]
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
exotic flower/(fig.) marvel/prodigy/(slang) weirdo/outlandish
(Internet slang) (of a situation, video clip etc) to make one think "wtf!"
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
(Internet slang) (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF
imaginative/to have one's mind buzzing with ideas
to be taken aback
(Internet slang) I can't even.../Are you kidding me!/OMG!
nothing is too bizarre/full of extraordinary things
(Internet slang) time after time/again and again and again
(Internet slang for 然而[ran2 er2]) however
(slang) shoot!/crap!
simply/at all/practically
(slang) really cool, awesome
